name: ListOrderedMap_putTest
description: Unit tests for the put method in the ListOrderedMap class.

test_cases.name: testPut_NewKey
test_cases.description: Tests the put method when adding a new key to the map.

test_cases.name: testPut_ExistingKey
test_cases.description: Tests the put method when updating an existing key in the map.

test_cases.name: testPut_IndexOutOfBounds
test_cases.description: Tests the put method when the index is out of bounds.

test_cases.name: testPut_ExistingKeyWithDifferentIndex
test_cases.description: Tests the put method when updating an existing key with a different index.
